meanings.definition: The time in the evening when supper is eaten.
meanings.sent1: At suppertime, families gather around the table to eat together.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to suppertime because it's when I get to relax and enjoy a good meal.
meanings.sent3: During suppertime, my dog sits patiently hoping for a tasty treat to fall from the table.
meanings.sent4: The golden hues of the setting sun signaled the arrival of suppertime.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread filled the house at suppertime, making everyone's mouths water.

meanings.definition: The meal eaten in the evening.
meanings.sent1: My favorite part of the day is when I sit down to enjoy my delicious suppertime.
meanings.sent2: After a long day at work, I always crave a hearty meal for suppertime.
meanings.sent3: For suppertime tonight, we're having spaghetti with meatballs, my absolute favorite!
meanings.sent4: The cozy kitchen was filled with laughter and chatter during suppertime.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of the fireplace added a special touch to our suppertime gathering.
